pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, January 9, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, January 9, 2018:

All times local.

Lower Sackville, Nova Scotia

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Sackville High School
1 Kingfisher Way

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should enter through the main entrance and present themselves in room 227 no later than 6:00 p.m.

Media appearances

  • 8:20 a.m. - A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Information Morning, CBC Radio One (Nova Scotia)
  • 8:35 a.m. - A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Le réveil, ICI Radio-Canada Première (Nouvelle-Écosse et T.-N.-L.)
  • 12:30 p.m. - A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on The Sheldon MacLeod Show, News 95.7
